name: The Crashed Cyborg
description:
This is a text based adventure decision game. It has a very simple story and its a small game.
In this game you play a cyborg who was forced to crash land on a planet full of evil droids.
To make a decision you press 1 or 2 on the keyboard. If you press number 1 you make the first decision, and if you press number 2 you make the second decision. If there's only 1 decision than just press number 1.
Have fun!

Credits:

Music made by Sonicboomcolt. Check out his SoundCloud: https://soundcloud.com/sonicboomcolt
